value.displayName: Workplace 1 - Allow compliant device rich apps
Workplace 2 - Allow non-compliant Browser to O365 with MFA and Session Controls
Workplace 3 - Block non-compliant Browser to other apps
Mobile 1 - Require approved client apps for Office 365 except EXO
Mobile 3 - Require compliant device for sensitive apps
Mobile 5 - Require compliant device for Office 365 on MDM devices
Mobile 4 - Require MFA for all Users
Emulates Legacy MFA configuration (User based MFA))
Guest 2 - Require MFA from critical Guests
Guest 1 - Allow Guests with sign-in frequency
Admin 3 - Block medium or high sign-in risk
User Actions 1 - Require MFA to Join Devices
Mobile 2 - Require compliant device or approved client app for all apps
VPN 2 - Block Pulse Secure Connect RU for all except BU RU
VPN 1 - Block Pulse Secure Connect for BU RU
